message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SY

This paper deals with the design and implementation of a security policy specification language for runtime monitoring of applications in mobile devices, with a focus on the Android operating system. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security), followed by cs.SE (Software Engineering) and cs.PL (Programming Languages). The paper also involves modifications to the Android OS kernel, which could fall under cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
